title: Sion ULT IS OP!!

embed.description: An extremely rare clip of a sion ult double rebounding off the wall into a kill.

body: Once you become a master of sion, you have the ablity to rebound off walls. Kappa

replies.body: {{sticker:slayer-pantheon-thumbs}} {{sticker:zombie-nunu-hearts}} Am i the only one who mains sion nowadays? i mean people took notice of him after he got his mecha skin, but now no-one cares again. at least i still play and LOVE this champion (my first champion i played and bought, he holds a special place in my heart. {{champion:14}} )
